title: Stock Update: Microsoft Corporation (NASDAQ:MSFT) – Microsoft Office update emphasizes collaboration
text: September 22, 2015 at 13:17 PM EDT Stock Update: Microsoft Corporation (NASDAQ:MSFT) – Microsoft Office update emphasizes collaboration [AP] – Microsoft has released a major update for Office with new features that show the company’s effort to adapt to shifts in how people use computers and software.
